meanings.sent1: My friend is dating a shiksas.
meanings.sent2: There are many shiksas in our neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: Why did the shiksas bring matzo to the Passover dinner?
meanings.sent4: The garden was full of colorful flowers, like a bouquet of shiksas.
meanings.sent5: The shiksas at the party wore elegant dresses and sparkling jewelry.

meanings.sent1: The party was filled with shiksas chatting and laughing.
meanings.sent2: He invited all his shiksas to the event.
meanings.sent3: The group of shiksas ordered latkes at the deli.
meanings.sent4: The field was covered in a sea of shiksas, each one unique.
meanings.sent5: In the play, the shiksas danced gracefully across the stage.
